verses.verse: And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7971>'Let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> that they may <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> a <S%H2287>feast<s%> to Me in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>'"

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that I should <S%H8085>obey<s%> His <S%H6963>voice<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>? I do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H1571>besides,<s%> I will not <S%H7971>let<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>"

Then they <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> has <S%H7122>met<s%> with us. <S%H4994>Please,<s%> let us <S%H1980>go<s%> a <S%H7969>three<s%> days' <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> that we may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> He <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon us with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>"

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4872>"Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> do you <S%H6544>draw<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6544>away<s%> from their <S%H4639>work<s%>? <S%H1980>Get<s%> [back] to your <S%H5450>labors!<s%>"

Again <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>"Look,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> are <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> and you would have them <S%H7673>cease<s%> from their <S%H5450>labors!<s%>"
So the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> and their <S%H7860>foremen,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"You are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>longer<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> to <S%H9226>make<s%> <S%H9226>brick<s%> as <S%H8543>previously<s%><S%H8032>;<s%> let them <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H9535>gather<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> for <S%H1992>themselves.<s%>

"But the <S%H4971>quota<s%> of <S%H3843>bricks<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they were <S%H6213>making<s%> <S%H8543>previously,<s%> <S%H8032><s%> you shall <S%H7760>impose<s%> on them; you are not to <S%H1639>reduce<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of it. <S%H3588>Because<s%> they are <S%H7503>lazy,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H6817>cry<s%> out, 'Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to our <S%H430>God.<s%>'

"Let the <S%H5656>labor<s%> be <S%H3513>heavier<s%> on the <S%H376>men,<s%> and let them <S%H6213>work<s%> at it that they may <S%H8159>pay<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H8159>attention<s%> to <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>"

So the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and their <S%H7860>foremen<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> 'I am not going to <S%H5414>give<s%> you [any] <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

'You <S%H1980>go<s%> [and] <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> for yourselves <S%H4480>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you can <S%H4672>find<s%> [it;] but <S%H369>none<s%> of your <S%H5656>labor<s%> will be <S%H1639>reduced.<s%>' "
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H9535>gather<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%> for <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> <S%H213>pressed<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3615>"Complete<s%> your <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H4639>quota,<s%> [your] <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>amount,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as when you <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H8401>straw.<s%>"

Moreover, the <S%H7860>foremen<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> had <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, were <S%H5221>beaten<s%> and were <S%H559>asked,<s%> <S%H4069>"Why<s%> have you not <S%H3615>completed<s%> your <S%H2706>required<s%> <S%H2706>amount<s%> <S%H1571>either<s%> <S%H8543>yesterday<s%> <S%H1571>or<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> in <S%H9226>making<s%> <S%H9226>brick<s%> as <S%H8543>previously<s%> <S%H8032><s%>?"

Then the <S%H7860>foremen<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> do you <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H3541>way<s%> with your <S%H5650>servants<s%>?

<S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> yet they keep <S%H559>saying<s%> to us, <S%H6213>'Make<s%> <S%H3843>bricks!<s%>' And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are being <S%H5221>beaten;<s%> but it is the <S%H2398>fault<s%> of your [own] <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are <S%H7503>lazy,<s%> [very] <S%H7503>lazy;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> [and] <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>'

"So <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> [and] <S%H5647>work;<s%> for you shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8401>straw,<s%> yet you must <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H8506>quota<s%> of <S%H3843>bricks.<s%>"

And the <S%H7860>foremen<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were in <S%H9563>trouble<s%> because they were <S%H559>told,<s%> "You must not <S%H1639>reduce<s%> [your] <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>amount<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H3843>bricks.<s%>"
When they <S%H3318>left<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H4480>presence,<s%> <S%H854><s%> they <S%H6293>met<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> as they were <S%H5324>waiting<s%> for them.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> upon you and <S%H8199>judge<s%> [you,] for you have <S%H887>made<s%> us <S%H887>odious<s%> <S%H7381><s%> in Pharaoh's <S%H5869>sight<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> us."

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> hast Thou <S%H7489>brought<s%> <S%H7489>harm<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>? <S%H4100>Why<s%> didst Thou <S%H2088>ever<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> me?

"Ever <S%H9241>since<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> in Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> he has <S%H7489>done<s%> <S%H7489>harm<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> and Thou hast not <S%H5337>delivered<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H5337>all.<s%>"
